body: This whip has a series of razor-sharp blades and fangs inset along its tip. It deals lethal damage, even to creatures with armor bonuses. If you are proficient with whips, you can use a scorpion whip as a whip.
name: Scorpion Whip
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Scorpion Whip
